name: ai-writing-assistant
description: RedPen - A MERN application for writing improvement

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && (if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) && mkdir dist && xcopy /e /s client\dist dist\
